data.title: Cockfighting Ban Flies Out of House in New Mexico
data.text:
Animal Protection Voters

Update & Action Alert

March 1, 2005

House Bill 878 to ban cockfighting flew out of the House today with a 50-15 vote. Cockfighting proponents seemed to concede defeat, with no cockfighters showing up to watch what ended up being a short, twenty minute debate.

Thomas Anderson (Albuquerque).

Janice Arnold-Jones (Albuquerque).
